article: In the seventh grade when my mother suggested that I should join the golf team, I thought she had lost her mind. But as _ , my mother won in the end. I _ on the junior school golf team in the seventh and eighth grade. The summer before _ school came, I had a burning _ to play on the high school team. This _ relationship with my parents _ during my high school years, and Mom and I _ it to the hours spent together on the golf course. _ you're walking down the freshly mowed , staring out _ miles of nothing but golf course, and looking up at the beautiful blue sky, you will realize _ is important in life. On the golf course, we're just two people who _ golf. _ has become part of my life during the past years. My friends know in the summer the place to find me is on the golf course. And I have to _ that all of it is thanks to my mom who _ me join that middle school golf team. She was right -- as usual.
